name: Example School Configuration
description: This is a template configuration file. Copy this file and customize it for your school.

Prog_C._comment: Program C Charter Resident - Main program including CM and SYC locations

Prog_C_TK._comment: Program C Charter Resident - Transitional Kindergarten (separate from main)

Prog_C_CM._comment: Program C Charter Resident - McClellan location (consolidated with main Prog_C)

Prog_C_SYC._comment: Program C Charter Resident - Sacramento Youth Center (consolidated with main Prog_C)

Prog_N._comment: Program N Non-Resident Charter - Main program including CM and SYC locations

Prog_N_TK._comment: Program N Non-Resident Charter - Transitional Kindergarten (separate from main)

Prog_N_CM._comment: Program N Non-Resident Charter - McClellan location (consolidated with main Prog_N)

Prog_N_SYC._comment: Program N Non-Resident Charter - Sacramento Youth Center (consolidated with main Prog_N)

Prog_J._comment: Program J Independent Study Charter Resident

Prog_J_TK._comment: Program J Independent Study Charter Resident - Transitional Kindergarten

Prog_K._comment: Program K Independent Study Charter Non-Resident

Prog_K_TK._comment: Program K Independent Study Charter Non-Resident - Transitional Kindergarten

_instructions.step_1: Copy this file to a new file with your school name (e.g., 'MySchool_Elementary.json')
_instructions.step_2: Open your PADC Excel file and note the row numbers where each program's data begins and ends
_instructions.step_3: Update the 'start' and 'stop' values for each program (use Excel row numbers)
_instructions.step_4: Set 'start' and 'stop' to null for programs that don't exist at your school
_instructions.step_5: Update the 'name' field to identify your school/configuration
_instructions.step_6: Load this configuration in the GUI using the 'Load Configuration' button
notes: Row numbers should match Excel row numbers (starting from 1)
The 'start' row is the first row where the program data appears
The 'stop' row is the last row where the program data appears
Programs with null values will be skipped during processing
CM and SYC locations are automatically consolidated with their main programs (C or N)
